  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Player getInstance()
      Singleton.

    • updatePlayer

      public void updatePlayer()
      Update player position based on player stats, collisions and direction

    • movePlayerToStartPoint

      public void movePlayerToStartPoint()
      Update player position to match level start point, first in vertical axis and then in horizzontal axis.

    • hitted

      public void hitted()
      When called, removes a life, and if still alive makes enemy go back to start position. lastHealth keeps track of new healt quantity and observers are notified. If healt is 0, triggers player death by updating deathTime.

    • applyPowerUp

      public void applyPowerUp(Power powerUp)
      Applies powerups to the player and notify observers.
      Parameters:
      powerUp - power to apply

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the thread of Player, to decide how much to wait before shooting again, shield duration, fast mode duration, how much time before disappearing after death. When players die, current context is setted on GAME_OVER and thread is stopped.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
